=API for greatest-least=
Usage: 
{{{
(ns <your-namespace>
  (:use clojure.contrib.greatest-least))
}}}


==Public Variables and Functions==
Shortcuts:
[#(_all-greatest_&_args) all-greatest] [#(_all-greatest-by_f_&_args) all-greatest-by] [#(_all-least_&_args) all-least] [#(_all-least-by_f_&_args) all-least-by] [#(_greatest_&_args) greatest] [#(_greatest-by_f_&_args) greatest-by] [#(_least_&_args) least] [#(_least-by_f_&_args) least-by] 

----
===(_all-greatest_ & args)===
<pre> Returns all the greatest elements.</pre>
----
===(_all-greatest-by_ f & args)===
<pre> Return all the elements for which f yields the greatest value.</pre>
----
===(_all-least_ & args)===
<pre> Returns all the least elements.</pre>
----
===(_all-least-by_ f & args)===
<pre> Return all the elements for which f yields the least value.</pre>
----
===(_greatest_ & args)===
<pre> Return the greatest argument.</pre>
----
===(_greatest-by_ f & args)===
<pre> Return the argument for which f yields the greatest value.</pre>
----
===(_least_ & args)===
<pre> Return the smallest element.</pre>
----
===(_least-by_ f & args)===
<pre> Return the argument for which f yields the smallest value.</pre>
